short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows bug metrics on the issues page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays software maintenance metrics on the issues pages of Github repositories.

It uses the BMI (backlog management index) which defined as the number of issues closed during a period
 divided by the number of opened issues during the same period, multiplied by 100. A BMI larger than 100 means the backlog was being reduced during the period.

Only issues labeled "bug" are counted.

The code is open-source and available on Github.
